name: Dicey Defense (MrManBLC, TobBot2)
description:
Defend your road against the onslaught of evil casino items! Place dice-towers with different numbers of sides and watch as they crumble your enemies!

How to play
  • Drag and drop towers from the right side onto the grass to place a tower (make sure you have enough money)
  • Once placed, the tower will 'roll'
  • After rolling, it will settle on a number - that is the number of bullets it shoots in its burst
  • If you are unhappy with the number, place the tower in the 'Re-roll' bag and wait a moment to hopefully get a better number

Escape to quit

Audio & Music: bensound.com & zapsplat.com
